segments.text: Here we are , Ryan ! This is where we're going to celebrate !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a ETV palace ! I'm glad I brought my platinum card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You won't need it . Stanley , my best man , is going to treat everybody !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where is Stanley ? It was his idea to have the bachelor's party at a ETV , wasn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If it were up to Stanley , we'd have the wedding in the ETV ! He loves to sing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I bet he's really good !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , uh , I'll let you decide that for yourself . He'll be here a little later . Here's our room !
segments.speaker: S1
